PermImportance<E,I> - Class in be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.importance.external.permutation

TwoConfusionMatrices - Class in be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.importance.external.permutation.indices

U

UnivariateSplit - Class in be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.splitting.split
An instance of this class is used in each node to stock the splitting information i.e. the rule to classify new samples and the value of the metric optimized while training (e.g. gini).
UnivariateSplit(int, double) - Constructor for class be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.splitting.split.UnivariateSplit
Initializes a univariate split on variable var which yielded a value of index
